website_summaries.verdict: A high-end fitted sheet that is comfortable and has the aesthetics to match.
cons: On the higher end of the price spectrum

customer_reviews.title: It's a scam not the sheets they advertise
customer_reviews.text: This is a scam do not buy. They advertise these sheets as 1500 thread count. When you recieve them they feel like 200-300 thread count. No where on the package will it confirm that they are 1500 thread count. Also it says it's made of 100% Egyptian cotton. But when you recieve them they will not say 100 % cotton anywhere they just simply say Egyptian cotton.
customer_reviews.author: hendo

customer_reviews.title: Nice replacement sheet.
customer_reviews.text: I just needed a fitted sheet. We own a lovely, expensive set of Ralph Lauren bed linens. All pieces are in good shape except the bottom sheet which developed a weak spot, then tore. I was not going to pay for a replacement Ralph Lauren, even if I could have found one. There on amazon I found this single sheet available for purchase. Is it as nice as the Ralph Lauren? Not quite, but almost. But then the expensive Ralph Lauren tore, didn't it. This is a good quality sheet and for the price you could not do better. It has deep side pockets, stays in place, and feels good next to the body. Glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pipergram

customer_reviews.title: Just Like Grandmas Sheets
customer_reviews.text: This one sheet reminds me of my mother's and grandma's bed sheets for the light weight, rather thin and translucent fabric and ever so slightly rough feel. Washes well, without wrinkles, pilling, or shrinkage. (I used fabric softener and cold water this first wash.) I'm certain this sheet will soften with time. Fits extra-deep pockets while maintaining a snug fit and clean look. Elastic around the entire edge of sheet. This is an excellent sheet for the price. Please know 200 count sheets can be quite soft as it's the length of the threads rather than the count that makes fabric feel soft and substantial.
customer_reviews.author: Valiant

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but still not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: While the price is very affordable and I know threadcount is fairly meaningless, the white fitted sheet I purchased was nowhere near "luxury". I needed only a fitted sheet and not a full set so the selection is pretty limited and I went with this brand based on the reviews. I washed the sheet immediately and you could tell it was not going to soften up over time and it has a very thin almost paper like feel to it. Then there is the issue of breathability - there is none. I was a very uncomfortable couple of hours of sleep before I took the sheet off altogether. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Thinksport

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Product packaging does not indicate that these are 1500 thread count and there is absolutely no way that they are 1500. If you hold them up to a light, you can see right through them. Would not buy again or recommend to anyone else looking for a luxurious high thread count sheet set. Also, for anyone looking to mix and match sets, the solid navy and striped navy sheet sets are two distinctly different colors of navy blue.
customer_reviews.author: Conor Caffrey

customer_reviews.title: not 1500 tc, not wrinkle free, and thin.
customer_reviews.text: just got these sheets two days, and they're thin, they not wrinkle free, the label is generic , and they are not thick soft, or anything that resembles Egyptian cotton, don't spend your money. I got 1000 tc from bed, bath ,and beyond , and you know are the real product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are nice sheets. The material is smooth and substantial
customer_reviews.text: These are nice sheets. The material is smooth and substantial. The construction is well done. The sheets fit my mattress snugly and with plenty of room and give to make making the bed a reasonable task rather than a tug-of-war The mattress is fairly thick--10 inches or perhaps a little thicker. I am pleased with these fitted cotton sateen sheets, so I have already ordered two more of them for my son's bed.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. S.

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy sheet
customer_reviews.text: This sheet being 200 thread count means it isn't going to be one of those soft as butter sheets, but it feels like it could last a good while. I have had to throw away too many of those high thread count fitted sheets because they don't wear well while feeling so wonderful. It's hard to find just a single sheet these days and even harder to find one that fits a 17" mattress. This one does with a couple of inches to tuck under, which is great. I will be ordering another one of these sheets to go with my other set that needs a fitted sheet to complete the set.
customer_reviews.author: Mary McClain

customer_reviews.title: Finally, just fitted sheets for sale!
customer_reviews.text: My husband/kid/dog are really really rough on my bed. The fitted sheets see the worst of their constant thrashing, jumping & wrestling. Plus bleach, hello! Needless to say, I have a shortage of just fitted sheets. Thank you Utopia for selling single fitted sheets for households like mine! The cotton is soft and breathable, perfect for So Cal weather. I would definitly purchase again, maybe even a colored one!
customer_reviews.author: Megan M.

customer_reviews.title: Fits nice
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with the quality. It is 100% cotton and washes up quite nice. It's a little rough, but it reminds me of the sheets when I was a kid. The size is quite nice for a deep mattress and the supplier was quite nice. They shipped the wrong sheet the first time but I returned that one and re-ordered.They sent an e-mail of apology and gave a discount on the second one.
customer_reviews.author: ginidaho

customer_reviews.title: These aren’t good sheets
customer_reviews.text: These supposedly high quality sheets had tiny little rough balls form all over it within the first two days of use. Don’t buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fitted sheet because I could buy it separately--without any flat sheet or pillow cases. I'm also very happy to find a 100% cotton product. If my pocketbook allowed it, I would invest in organic cotton sheets, but for now, this sheet offers what I need. I was also surprised that although it's 200 thread count, I didn't find it to be as nearly as scratchy as I expected. So don't let that number deter you... Happy shopping!
customer_reviews.author: J. Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: These sheets were listed as premium quality but did not specifi the thread count but I ordered them anyway. Big Mistake they are 220 thread count, you can see right through them. Obviously I don't know how long they will last since I got them on the bed for the first time today.
customer_reviews.author: Francis B Roubique

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant at first due to the low thread count, but this turned out to be significantly smoother and more comfortable than I had expected. The fit is very good for thicker mattresses thanks to the deep pockets at the corners. Overall the value is significant and the comfort is very good, particularly if you use a mattress pad or memory foam topping which increases the girth of your mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Carmichael

customer_reviews.title: Kept waiting for the other shoe to drop . . .
customer_reviews.text: I waited to launder the sheets a couple times before i reviewed them. I personally like a relatively substantial sheet rather than soft, particularly for a fitted bottom. The big test for me is if they stay relatively smooth during the night. These sheets passed with flying colors, launder very well. My question - how can Utopia make fine sheets at this price and most other brands cost 3-4 times more??
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sheets
customer_reviews.text: These are 200 thread count sheets not cotton but they are very soft. I like the way the elastic goes all around not just the corners and they stay on the bed also the stitching is very very well done they are well made and the price is great arrived with duvet cover very fast pkg is nice overall very pleased and i will try more of these
customer_reviews.author: Patty A

customer_reviews.title: it was pretty wrinkled, but I expected that
customer_reviews.text: This fitted sheet arrived quickly. Out of the dryer, it was pretty wrinkled, but I expected that. I'm willing to put up with wrinkles to sleep on 100% cotton. The sheet isn't super soft or smooth, maybe even a tad scratchy, but hopefully another washing will soften it. It fit my mattress better than most fitted sheets as there wasn't a ton of excess and I didn't have to work hard to get it over the corners (I have a pillow top mattress). The next morning the sheet was still in place with no major folds or migrations. I went ahead and bought a second fitted sheet and a top sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Helen P. Rollins

customer_reviews.title: Crisp, white - perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of crisp, white sheets and this one truly fits the bill! It also truly fits my mattress! Plenty of depth for the deeper mattress but correctly fits at corners (a problem I have occasionally run into at times). And I like that I could by a single fitted sheet as opposed to a complete set.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done when dealing with rough feet
customer_reviews.text: Not the softest sheets, but it gets the job done when your significant other's rough feet keep tearing your nice sheets. I finally gave up on buying nice fitted sheets, so now I buy this fitted sheet and use a nicer top sheet. It softens up after a few washes, but definitely not close to the soft and silky sheets I have at a slightly higher threat count.
customer_reviews.author: CF

customer_reviews.title: I bought two - glad I did!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these fitted sheets - and i am glad I did! Since I just bought them, I can't vouch for the wear but I CAN say that they appear to be well made and are "as advertised" for which I am pretty happy. The box they came in arrived pushed in but they are SHEETS, after all, and come like all sheets wrapped in plastic so no problem. I'd do it again but, hopefully, not for a while!!
customer_reviews.author: hereistand

customer_reviews.title: So soft and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: We've had this sheet for months now, washed several times, and it still feels so luxurious.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Cool and Comfy
customer_reviews.text: At first I had thought they were going to be a bit rough but after a wash and sleeping on it one night it was very cool and not rough. They are not as sleek as some sateen sheets but it felt actually quite nice to sleep on. Give it a chance if you are in doubt.
customer_reviews.author: clmor

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality, it broke apart in 3 years
customer_reviews.text: Weak structure, horrible quality: both the metal structure and wood veneer broke and I had to repair it already 3 times. To put things into perspective, the combined weight of me and my partner is 200lb. After less than 5 years I had to throw it away. AVOID
customer_reviews.author: Antonino Mancusi

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: We have very deep mattresses, and these sheets work perfectly on them. After washing, they were soft enough to want to sleep on (they wrinkle, but that is what cotton does). The fitting goes all around the sheet, so that they stay on. Best of all, they are sold individually...we have a ton of "top sheets" and didn't need those anyway.
customer_reviews.author: A student of history

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: Mediocre quality, corse. They feel like a poly-cotton blend. Fit is good. Disappointed. Was expecting better based on reviews.
customer_reviews.author: User One

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a good sheet
customer_reviews.text: I have used this sheet less than one week, but it appears to be quite satisfactory. It has deep enough pockets to accommodate my large mattress, and the cotton fabric seems to be of good quality. I was pleased to be able to buy just the bottom sheet instead of the complete set that I saw elsewhere. The price is good. I'd buy it again, assuming it holds up beyond this initial use.
customer_reviews.author: Marthona

customer_reviews.title: Very good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Just washed for the first time and very pleased. The fabric is soft and has the feel and texture of much more expensive sheets. I am very pleased with both price and quality. The corners are very deep and the elastic held up to washing and drying, too.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Anne

customer_reviews.title: Sheets are good value for comfort
customer_reviews.text: Good value for money, fit well and was comfortable with initial washings. Good for temperature - fabric does not make me really hot. I use a duvet cover instead of a flat sheet, so nice to be able to buy item separately instead of having to buy a whole set to get the fitted sheet. I rated a 4 instead of a 5 because they are a bit thinner than my other fitted sheets and I am not sure how they'll wear long term, but no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: DEERAYT

customer_reviews.title: Just fine for the price
customer_reviews.text: Just fine for the price. There is some pilling, and it's a little too big for our bed, but if you had any kind of mattress pad it would probably fit fine. It doesn't seem to hold on to odor after washing like other bedding I've bought made of similar material. It's not the softest or smoothest, but it is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Frugalhorn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent deep pocket sheet
customer_reviews.text: I could not find a deep pocket fitted sheet in the store. This sheet is perfect. I have a queen size bed with a 4" memory foam topper and the sheet fit great. They washed up nice and are an excellent quality for the price. I would definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: mallen

customer_reviews.title: Great sheets, study
customer_reviews.text: Great sheets, study, but soft. They are perfect for us because my husband moves his feet so much at night that he once wore a hole in a fitted sheet in one night. These last quite awhile even with his abuse! They are our go to sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Harshest Cotton Fabric I Ever Experienced
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the harshest cotton fabric I have ever experienced in bedding, even after washing and treatment with softener. The fabric is so rough that it wakes me up from contact with my body. It also causes itches. I can't stand it. I have never had any sensitivity problems with any bedding or cotton fabrics in any context and am not particularly spoiled regarding quality. I have had 200-count bedding before without any problems. So this experience is really extraordinary. It is also very disappointing since this material is advertised for its supposed "optimal softness." I absolutely cannot recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: mallet

customer_reviews.title: Sort of like sandpaper
customer_reviews.text: I washed it once and it is still rough on the skin and seems to crumble when on the mattress. I am washing a third time and hope it is better but doubtful. I would not recommend unless other buyers have a better experience. After second washing it still serves well for exfoliating.
customer_reviews.author: Boston Fellow

customer_reviews.title: I love this fitted it sheet
customer_reviews.text: I love this fitted it sheet. So many are not large enough to go on large mattresses. Not only is this large enough it is nice and soft also. I just wish sheet makers would make a mark or something saying this end goes at top or this end goes the long way. Guess you can't have everything. Ma
customer_reviews.author: Martha A.

customer_reviews.title: but it dried up nicely, and look forward to using it with the ...
customer_reviews.text: Just out of wash before using and this fitted sheet may not be as soft as others, but it dried up nicely, and look forward to using it with the extra top sheets that I have.
customer_reviews.author: ElfiePow

customer_reviews.title: fine to sleep on
customer_reviews.text: fits a bit big on our queen Sealy bed. our mattress is.only 9 inches.deep though. feels.fine to sleep on! does the job and a great price! we acquired a hole in our previous fitted sheet that came with a set from walmart. i had alot of trouble finding just the option of buying a fitted sheet.elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: D Schager

customer_reviews.title: Great white sheets
customer_reviews.text: It's a great sheet. Feels great against the skin. I got it for my boyfriend's tempurpedic which was hard to find a sheet with deep enough pockets. This one really worked for us. It's great for us. I recommend it if you're looking for a sheet for a thick mattress and don't want to spend a ton.
customer_reviews.author: Roonil Wazlib

customer_reviews.title: 2 thumbs down
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed in these sheets, very expensive for the poor quality
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Good quality,  good price.
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate being able to buy a flat sheet alone. I have alot of top sheets that are still in fine shape, but fitted sheet, not so much. Washes and dries well. I am buying more. Dog hair does stay on it and needs a lint brush to come off.
customer_reviews.author: connie cn

customer_reviews.title: I bought a 2nd fitted sheet from these folks
customer_reviews.text: These are a good bang for the buck. Getting harder to find decent cotton sheets anywhere. They are not perfect, but for now, they are the best thing going to replace my worn fitted sheets.
customer_reviews.author: CommonSense

customer_reviews.title: NOT 100% Cotton
customer_reviews.text: If you know about fabrics, you know it's not 100% cotton. It has sateen mixed. 100% cotton are soft and get wrinkles. This is NOT 100% Cotton.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Shrestha

customer_reviews.title: great sheet
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was as thick as expensive sheets but I don't care because its nice cool cotton. And u know how u get dirt or whatever in the bed and have to shake it off each night? Well this sheet makes that so easy. And making the bed is super easy now too
customer_reviews.author: Lizwyo

customer_reviews.title: they fit great on my 12 inch foam mattress
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I ordered. After washing, they fit great on my 12 inch foam mattress. They feel great too. It's your basic fitted bed sheet and for the price it was worth it. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: H. tran

customer_reviews.title: It's nice and soft - I just needed one fitted sheet ...
customer_reviews.text: It's nice and soft - I just needed one fitted sheet for my double bed as the one I had was worn and "pilled". I just can't sleep on that - it feels like sand! This sheet has been washed several times, no "pilling", and is soft as ever!
customer_reviews.author: Wadene Musgrave

customer_reviews.title: Good sheet for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good sheet for the price. Here are a couple things I really liked. First, this 100 percent cotton sheet fit perfectly right out of the dryer. Second, the fitted corners worked just fine with my fairly thick mattress (about 10 inches). The feel of the sheet is not luxurious, but this is a good fitted sheet for the price. I will likely buy more, especially if I can get a different color than white at a similar price.
customer_reviews.author: Folk Rock Blues

customer_reviews.title: Deep pockets!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this specifically for the deep pockets and it definitely has them doesn't come off in the night and fits our mattress great. Not the softest sheet in the world, but works if you don't want to have to adjust it every day.
customer_reviews.author: SMarchetti

customer_reviews.title: Fits very well a tall air mattress
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time. Fits a tall air mattress very well. I'll buy it again. It's just the fitted bed sheet. When I ordered it, I was in a rush and I didn't notice that this is just the fitted sheet, so I was a little disappointed that I had to go shopping for the rest of the set.
customer_reviews.author: C. Simon

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. The sheet seems a bit thin and while it is deep pocket doesn't completely cover each side of the mattress so maybe I needed an extra deep pocket. Also seems scratchy at first but after I washed it it felt softer so I assume it will continue to soften over more washes. Overall I'm pleased with the value as it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie R.

customer_reviews.title: Soft enough!
customer_reviews.text: This sheet is great for the price. Could you pay more for luxurious sheets? sure - but these sheets aren't sandpaper... they're soft enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Baer

customer_reviews.title: but I thought that maybe it would shrink to fit better with a washing or two
customer_reviews.text: When the sheet first arrived, it was clear that it was not going to fit snugly on my mattress -- it was quite a bit too large, but I thought that maybe it would shrink to fit better with a washing or two. That seems to be the case. After two washings, it's still a pretty loose fit, but much better than when it first arrived. And the truth is, I don't think I could expect a whole lot more for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Manchester

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: This is not the highest quality sheet: it's a bit scratchy and rough. But I needed a cheap, white sheet to cover my mattress box spring, and this was perfect for that job. It fit the box spring easily and is a very crisp white. So, no, I wouldn't want to sleep on it, but for "display" purposes, it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit. Cooler fabric unlike microfiber or even Cotton
customer_reviews.text: What I expected . Got deep pockets bc I had ordered a foam mattress topper. Perfect fit.Cooler fabric unlike microfiber or even Cotton
customer_reviews.author: D tash

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: My fitted sheets always seem to get holes long before the top sheet is worn. I was very happy to be able to purchase only the fitted sheet. Good quality and fit; washes well. The shade of white doesn't match my set exactly, but not enough to matter.
customer_reviews.author: littlespring12

customer_reviews.title: Great queen fitted sheet!
customer_reviews.text: Great queen fitted sheet! Worried about the lower thread count at first, but all the good reviews it received - and the fact that it was double-stitched and had elastic all the way around - promoted me to give it a try. Pleased!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: These are great. They fit well on a new mattress
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They fit well on a new mattress, standard mattress with about 9" width. would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: terster

customer_reviews.title: With a 200 thread count one can't expect luxury softness ...
customer_reviews.text: With a 200 thread count one can't expect luxury softness. This was the only deep pocket fitted sheet that I could find anywhere without buying a complete sheet set. I have a plethora of pillowcases and didn't want to buy more. Utopia Bedding met my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Fake!  Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are labeled as cotton but they are totally synthetic. I know because I held them to a flame and they melted into a glob of plastic!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: A great find!
customer_reviews.text: This sheet was surprisingly soft for the price! It is impossible to find just a fitted sheet in the stores so this was a great find. I am pleased with the fit and the texture.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Page

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 15 " deep mattress so well, arrived on time and as described. Looks great and feels great. Comfortable to sleep on and easy to put on and to remove. I wish they had better variety of colors but it'll do.
customer_reviews.author: Toneduptitties

customer_reviews.title: The tag says 100% cotton, but I don't believe ...
customer_reviews.text: The tag says 100% cotton, but I don't believe it. I use nothing but cotton linens and this has the feel of polyester. After reading the other reviews about "pilling" I sent it back. It is also very poorly constructed.
customer_reviews.author: bkd'a

customer_reviews.title: I really like it. It is thin
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. It is thin, so if you have an orangy foam then you could somewhat see it. Otherwise, the feel is great and would definitely purchase additional colors with matching pillow covers.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Other than that they are a nice solid cotton sheet
customer_reviews.text: Small rip in the sheet the second time I washed it. Wish I had spent a few extra dollars and bought something that I could at least wash. Other than that they are a nice solid cotton sheet, not scratchy but not flimsy FEELING, because they are still flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: rjsmith

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, Fair Price
customer_reviews.text: I looked everywhere for the 100% white cotton sheets and was not able to find any other than these. Every time I thought I had found what I wanted somewhere else, I discovered by reading the fine print that the sheets were not really 100% cotton - these are. These sheets are as promised, and seem to be very good sheets. The label confirms they are 100% cotton, and they have the look and feel of it. I was very glad to find this company and this product, and I highly recommend both to others.
customer_reviews.author: Great Gouda

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Sheet is pretty loose on my double pillow top mattress, which I suppose is better than my usual problem of them not fitting. Not super soft and comfortable but the material is thicker, which I like. It does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole B

customer_reviews.title: Good, old fashioned
customer_reviews.text: Good, old fashioned, deep-pocketed fitted white sheets. Love em. Bought two. I will keep buying them. Great feel, great threadcount, and substantial. Not the type of sheet that will look like it's translucent after a couple of washings.
customer_reviews.author: Pattip2

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought only the fitted sheet because I needed to cover an unsightly box spring. I didn't need high thread count since it isn't being slept on and this is exactly what I needed. Not saying it doesn't feel good, just can't comment on how it feels to sleep on. Quality seems good and it fits perfectly. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Shrinkage of fitted sheet so severe that it is impossible to get a good fit without corners puckering. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great material
customer_reviews.text: As I am writing this article, I have been sleeping on this sheet. Great price, great material. It is a deep fitted sheet and will nicely fit the newer deep mattresses. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne W

customer_reviews.title: Very functional. Perfect for the price.
customer_reviews.text: White fitted sheets. These are the Toyota camry of the sheet world. You can dress them up with the rest of your covers. They are soft and functional. Came promptly. Bleach will eliminate any unfortunate stains.
customer_reviews.author: Riverside

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of this sheet. It was nice and roomy with the depth plenty enough to accommodate my thick mattress - some other sheets I've tried say they fit a 15 inch mattress but they have been much too tight and slip off. Not this one - it fits very nicely. And the feel of the sheet (the most important attribute) is dreamy soft. I highly recommend this sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Love these 100% cotton sheets!!!
customer_reviews.text: Give me good, 100% cotton sheets and I sleep cooler and more comfortable. Love these! They are not the flimsly, silky, wrinkle-free microfiber sheets that I detest. They're wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Rivergal

customer_reviews.title: What can I say, it's a sheet.. It works.
customer_reviews.text: So I was dumb when I bought this.. Didn't realize it was just the bottom sheet. For some reason I thought it was a set.. Anyways.. After a few washes the sheet softens up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Mesa

customer_reviews.title: a good economical choice..
customer_reviews.text: The sheets washed nicely...They are a good weight and weave for the Florida heat and humidity. Don't know yet abt wear and tear. Will let you know. I use them in rental house. They get washed and bleached frequently.
customer_reviews.author: sandra champagne

customer_reviews.title: This is a fine product at a very good price Smooth fabric Washes ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine product at a very good price Smooth fabric Washes well Well-made My second order Very pleased !
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Soft sheet
customer_reviews.text: I noticed that this fitted sheet was only 200 thread count so I expected some roughness to the touch but I found it smooth and soft. What a surprise. I use these sheets for my vacation home business on Martha's Vineyard. Today I just ordered six more and a dozen of the king size fitted sheet. Great quality and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Clif Freedman

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sheets but Not Soft
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are fine but they are a bit starchy. I've tried washing them which really didn't seem to help much. I'm using them anyway and they don't really bother me but they are certainly rougher than other sheets I've had.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper No. 161803

customer_reviews.title: Bottom sheets always wear out first. Got this instead ...
customer_reviews.text: Bottom sheets always wear out first. Got this instead of a whole new set. Now need another in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: D. Decker

customer_reviews.title: utopia cotton fitted sheet queen size
customer_reviews.text: This sheet was received promptly and in perfect condition. It s exactly what I needed to fit my new temperpedic mattress it is perfect for the corners are nice and large for this thick mattress and fit my 16 in corners snuggly but total coverage and it actually stays on. I will be ordering more of them , also like the cotton sheet better than micro fiber.Very pleased with this purchase thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Condry

customer_reviews.title: Designer quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the quality of this sheet. Elastic all around..very nice fabric. I bought it to use with a Vera Wang top sheet of high quality. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: grnnydi

customer_reviews.title: Glad I found this!
customer_reviews.text: I was glad to find this because it is very hard to find a single fitted sheet! And when I am handling it, it is not the softest material I've ever had. But it is comfortable to sleep on and washes well.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really impressed with this sheet... very inexpensive AND of good quality! Ran it through the wash once and put it on my bed. It fit very well and hasn't come adrift once. I'll order another in the near future!
customer_reviews.author: OilBurnerBob

customer_reviews.title: Good, cheap
customer_reviews.text: Good, cheap, breathes well. I don't even care if it doesn't last, it's cheap enough to replace. But I've gone through 10 washes or so with mine and all it does it get more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: It was SO great to find a simple (100% cotton) fitted sheet sold ...
customer_reviews.text: It was SO great to find a simple (100% cotton) fitted sheet sold separately!!! Everything is sold in sets and the less expensive ones are sleazy microfiber. Fitted sheets wear out so much more quickly than the flat sheets and you end up with a myriad of flat sheets and pillowcases and NO fitted sheet! This was incredibly affordable, washed beautifully and comes out crisp but not hard and crinkly! Love it. Please keep selling individual sheets. I would heartily recommend this product - cant beat the price, good quality and fast delivery too!
customer_reviews.author: JRC

customer_reviews.title: Very good sheet.
customer_reviews.text: A very nice smooth sheet, fits perfectly. The package was on time and waiting on my doorstep. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Monika Robinson

customer_reviews.title: A very good product.
customer_reviews.text: A great fitted sheet at a very low price. Fits my queen size mattress perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Dominick Caputo

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't really all that satisfied, expected more from this product. But for the price you pay this is quite ok ... I also really appreciated the feedback from the seller and am keeping the item.
customer_reviews.author: Dino

customer_reviews.title: sheet
customer_reviews.text: The bottom sheet arrived sooner than expected....it fits the bed just right.....the one thing I would say is that the sheet is not as soft as I would prefer......but other than that...I am satisfied...............
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Needed to replace some fitted sheets that lost there elasticity in the corners, these do the job just fine. Good replacements, good material. NOT microfiber, which I hate.
customer_reviews.author: Boots

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: The queen sheet was crisp and very deep pockets to accommodate thick mattress. The sheet is a bit rough, even after washing. Overall not a bad sheet for the price, although next time I will look for a higher thread count.
customer_reviews.author: Kane

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise I'm happy with them
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are definitely solid white, they fit my mattress very well. They are not as thick or as smooth feeling as some sheets I have purchased in the past. Otherwise I'm happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Ann M Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Not "Premium Quality"
customer_reviews.text: I have never reviewed anything on Amazon before. This product is so bad that I am reviewing it. This is not a "premium quality" sheet. It has the texture of cheap hospital linens. Truly awful, do not believe the star rating on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua D

customer_reviews.title: Love these sheets!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sheets! They are exactly what I was looking for: 100% cotton, relatively tight weave, and crisp. I liked them so much I bought a second set a week later.
customer_reviews.author: Java

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected for the price. I like a crisp cotton sheet & this is what I got. The fit is good - my mattress is very deep with a 3" foam topper & this sheet fits well.
customer_reviews.author: L.A.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sheet at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I waited for several washings before submitting the review. The sheet has held up very well! Not supremely soft, but very comfortable. A terrific value!
customer_reviews.author: Rubilips

customer_reviews.title: Finaly!
customer_reviews.text: It is very difficult to find sheets sold separately in the stores now. This purchase was exactly what I wanted. All expectations were met. Sheet is soft and durable. 100% cotton!!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia R

customer_reviews.title: economical  fitted sheet
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic I am buying more for my teenage boys it fits great on the bed washes well too. I like the price it fits in my budget
customer_reviews.author: Customer K

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are super nice! Very tightly woven and wash superbly. They are like my grandma's sheets and not the satiny ones they make now. I love them, make me feel rich.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The bedding came very quickly. Have not had a ...
customer_reviews.text: The bedding came very quickly. Have not had a chance to wash and put it on my bed. But, I opened the package and it is what I have been looking for. Cotton sheets!
customer_reviews.author: N. J. Ciccone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sheets for the price. Especially nice fit on an extra thick mattress.
customer_reviews.author: weedqueen1

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and comfy sheet
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and comfy sheet. I only bought the fitted sheet to try it. Washes and dries with no shrinkage. The price is great. I plan on ordering more. It also fit my deep pocket mattress.
customer_reviews.author: sandy Lorenzen

product_meta.title: Unique Beddings Italian 1500 Thread Count Heavy Soft Egyptian Cotton Sheet Set DEEP Pocket, Queen, Red Stripe, Premium Italian Finish (Features : Fully Elastic Fitted Sheet Fits 10-12" Pocket)

Queen Size Sheet Set Measurement: Fitted Sheet ( 60 X 80 ) Inch, Flat sheet ( 90 X 102 ) Inch, Pillowcase ( 20 X 30 ) Inches.
DEEP POCKETS : Fitted sheet has elastic all around to stretch and fit snugly over mattresses up to 10-12" Inches Deep Pocket.

NO RISK PURCHASE 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: Our #1 goal is to offer you the most amazing products at the best prices for the ultimate customer experience.
